parameters.name: Close
parameters.description: True to close the design table, false to not

title: IDesignTable.UpdateTable
description: Applies the changes made to the design table to the model.
signature:
System.Boolean UpdateTable( 
   System.Int32
Type
,
   System.Boolean
Close
)

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description: Type of update as defined in swDesignTableUpdateOptions_e

parameters.name: Close
parameters.description: True to close the design table, false to not

returns: True if the changes made to the design table update the model, false if not
remarks:
IDesignTable::UpdateModel
is a simplified version of this method.
